channel.title: Please someone help me
channel.description: okay so i got a source downloaded (allstarscape source) and i can go to mopar or silab and login with ip as localhost, but how do i get my server a ip so that everyone else can log in? please someone help its much appreciated

item.title: Please someone help me
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

Step 1) Portforward
Step 2) Www.whatismyipaddress.com
Step 3) Www.no-ip.com
Step 4) Www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
Step 5) Have fun.
